page.title: 13A DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content: I get up at about 7.30a.m. every morning except for Saturday and Sunday .After breakfast Ipack my bags and set off for school at about 8.40a.m.School starts at 9.00a.m.Assembly is at 9.10a.m. then we work till playtime at 10.35a.m.Dinner is at 12.00 noon.At 1.00p.m. we come back in to do some more work.Afternoon play is at 2.15p.m.School finishes at 3.30p.m.In a day we usually do some form of maths,language,reading,topic,art and P.E. I normally get home at 3.50p.m.After tea I have a piano lesson for one hour at 5.45p.m.At 7.00p.m. I go to the Mobile Library.I watch T.V. until 9.00p.m. then I go to bed and read.I like reading mysteries.My favourite author is Enid Blyton. By Alison,aged 11.
